attributes.action: require immigrants to the UK to swear allegiance to the Crown, Parliament and people.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Dual or multiple nationality not permissible. An appropriate oath of allegiance must incorporate legal sanctions. Thus, understanding of the English language, expression in the English language, support of Crown, Parliament, Armed Forces and people. Recognition that failure constitutes treason involving penalties. Penalties limited to removal of British citizenship and deportation or execution. All individuals of non-British ethnic origin to be included irrespective of original entry legislation, birth or other consideration. In addition, no places of worship to be permitted in UK except those of Anglican, RC, Jewish or similar origin. Fundamentalist Islamic beliefs to be prohibited. Detection to result in administrative removal of citizenship and deportation without recourse.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
